author: wsjcom
title: Russia Has Always Taken A Long View on False Data
text:
Regarding “Tone-Deaf: Facebook’s Russia Bungle” (page one, March 3): The public needs to understand the Russian—and before that, Soviet—tactic of dezinformatsiya, or disinformation. Stalin adopted dezinformatsiya in 1923 as one of several “active measures” to subvert the West. As your article points out, the pro-Kremlin Internet Research Agency began its work in July 2013, long before either Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump declared for office.
